constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 30 (Tuesday, February 15, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CALVERT:
H.R. 6721.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority for this bill is pursuant to
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18
AND
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H1124]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

title: Corona Municipal Airport Lease Extension Act
